solution_line_template: Before his birthday, Estevan has {total_blankets} / {polka_dot_divisor} = <<{total_blankets}/{polka_dot_divisor}={initial_polka_dot_blankets}>>{initial_polka_dot_blankets} polka-dot blankets

After his birthday, Estevan has {initial_polka_dot_blankets} + {new_polka_dot_blankets} = <<{initial_polka_dot_blankets}+{new_polka_dot_blankets}={total_polka_dot_blankets}>>{total_polka_dot_blankets} polka-dot blankets
